alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Clark; Jackson; Trempealeau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 8:23PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Buffalo, Clark, central Jackson and northern Trempealeau Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 823 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Modena to 8 miles east of Shortville. Movement was northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Black River Falls, Neillsville, Whitehall, Alma, Osseo, Blair, Independence, Loyal, Strum, Greenwood, Price, Humbird, Hatfield, Shortville, York, Lynn, Longwood, Eleva, Northfield and Merrillan. This includes Interstate 94 between mile markers 88 and 117. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
